name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Milton DURER, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Milton DURER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Joseph J. Carlin (Court-appointed), Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Paul Diamond, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
441 A.2d 1213
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Milton DURER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 18, 1982.
Decided March 10, 1982.
Joseph J. Carlin (Court-appointed), Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Paul Diamond, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
